PERMIT NO. 1022-AA/2016
In exercise
of the powers under rule 8 of the Aircrafts
Ru!es, 1937, National
Security Guard is hereby permitted to carry or to cause to be carried by air the arms,
ammunitions
and explosives
during movement
of Task
Force every time, whenever
such live Operational
Moves or Training / Exercises are planned / conducted in future to
/ from any point within India subject to the observance of the following conditions:-
(i)
the level of safety achieved
is equivatent
with those provided
in ICAO
Technical Instructions;
(ii)
the goods are so packed, protected and secured as to avoid the possibility
of their being a source of danger;
(iii)
nature of goods is clearly and conspicuously
marked on the outside of the
package(s) containing them; and
(iv)
the goods are carried only in the cargo hold of the aircraft.
2.
This permit is valid w.e.f 01-10-2016 to 31-10-2017.
